text: Just finished the most recent episode of One Piece, all caught up now. #OnePiece
Can’t wait for the next great ninja war in Boruto! I wonder what ninjas will be taking the veteran's place. #Boruto
Training hard for the next battle is what Luffy does every time he loses and that what makes this show so good. #OnePiece
Just had an amazing dinner at the tavern Lord Rimuru paid the tab with a few pieces of his last hunt. #ThatTimeIGotReincarnatedAsASlime
Wrote a new song about our adventures, usually the Black Bulls join in but I suppose they were too tired from their last mission. #BlackClover
Just repaired my gear. Im not sure when the next titan attack will be, but I'll be ready. #AOT
Had a great conversation with an old friend, and it made me think about the time when I almost
Can’t wait for the next great ninja war in Boruto! I wonder what ninjas will be taking the veteran's place. #Boruto
Just finished rewatching all of One Piece. Luffy's journey never gets old! #OnePiece
Naruto’s determination is so inspiring. I’m ready to take on anything! #Naruto
The new season of My Hero Academia is incredible! Deku is really growing into his power. #MyHeroAcademia
Attack on Titan keeps me on the edge of my seat every episode. The suspense is unreal! #AttackOnTitan
I can’t believe how intense the battles are in Demon Slayer. Nezuko’s fight scenes are amazing! #DemonSlayer
Sword Art Online makes me want to dive into a virtual world of my own. The concept is just so cool! #SwordArtOnline
Dragon Ball Super is the best! The transformations and battles just keep getting better! #DragonBallSuper
